brief: Winter Olympics day five brings two gold medal chances for Norway today.
Johaug races for cross-country gold, Granerud and Lindvik fly for ski jumping glory.
Liverpool chase Arsenal at Sunderland tonight in Premier League title race.

items.text: ğŸ¥‡ Today: Women's 10km Classic (09:00), Normal Hill Ski Jumping (16:00)
ğŸ‡³ğŸ‡´ Johaug headlines first XC gold, Granerud/Lindvik lead jumping charge

expandItems.text: Thu: Boe brothers (20km biathlon), Kristoffersen/Braathen (giant slalom)
Sun: Large hill ski jumping, 50km XC mass start

radar: Thursday brings a massive double: Boe brothers hunting biathlon gold in the 20km individual, while Kristoffersen and Braathen duel for giant slalom glory at Bormio.
Klaebo's sprint free on Friday is the headline Olympic moment for Norway's greatest active skier, followed by Riiber's overwhelming favoritism in nordic combined.
Hovland tees off Sunday at Pebble Beach, one of golf's most iconic venues and a must-watch PGA Tour event.
